p: The correlation between the phenolics content (total polyphenols, phenolic acids and flavonoids contents) and antioxidant activities, including the DPPH free radical scavenging activity, FRAP assay, ABTS scavenging activity, superoxide anion radical scavenging activity and iron (II) chelating activity, were evaluated using Pearsonâ€™s correlation analysis ( Table 8).
